beastapi/beastframebuffer.h File Reference

This reference page is linked to from the following overview topics: Monitoring Jobs and Retrieving Updates, Retrieving the Rendered Output.

#include "beastapitypes.h"

File Description

The Beast framebuffer functions.

Enumerations
enum   ILBChannelSelection {
  ILB_CS_R = 0, ILB_CS_G, ILB_CS_B, ILB_CS_A,
  ILB_CS_Z, ILB_CS_RGB, ILB_CS_RGBA, ILB_CS_RGBZ,
  ILB_CS_RGBAZ, ILB_CS_ALL
}

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum ILBChannelSelection
Search for all occurrences

Default selections of channels when reading out pixel/vertex data.

Enumerator:
ILB_CS_R 

Red channel only.

Search for all occurrences
ILB_CS_G 

Green channel only.

Search for all occurrences
ILB_CS_B 

Blue channel only.

Search for all occurrences
ILB_CS_A 

Alpha channel only.

Search for all occurrences
ILB_CS_Z 

Z-channel only.

Search for all occurrences
ILB_CS_RGB 

Red, green and blue channels only.

Search for all occurrences
ILB_CS_RGBA 

Red, green, blue and alpha channels.

Search for all occurrences
ILB_CS_RGBZ 

Red, green, blue and Z channels.

Search for all occurrences
ILB_CS_RGBAZ 

Red, green, blue, alpha and Z channels.

Search for all occurrences
ILB_CS_ALL 

All channels.

Search for all occurrences

Function Documentation

ILBStatus ILBDestroyFramebuffer ( ILBFramebufferHandle  fb )
Search for all occurrences

Destroys and frees all memory related to a framebuffer.

The framebuffer handle will be invalid afterwards.
Note this will happen automatically when the job is destroyed. Use this function to avoid using more temporary memory than necessary when importing results.

Parameters:
fb the framebuffer to erase
Returns:
The result of the operation.
Examples:
examples-physical/code/common/textures.h, examples-physical/code/common/utils.h, examples/code/common/textures.h, include/beastapi/beastframebuffer.h, and maya/beastmayaplugin/src/beastwrappers/beastframebufferwrapper.cpp.

int32 *  channels 
)
Search for all occurrences

Gets the number of channels in the framebuffer.

Returns:
The result of the operation.
Examples:

ILBStatus ILBReadRegionHDR ( ILBFramebufferHandle  fb,
int32  minX,
int32  minY,
int32  maxX,
int32  maxY,
ILBChannelSelection  channels,
float *  target 
)
Search for all occurrences

Reads back a region in a framebuffer.

The region is specified as inclusive for the lower part and exclusive for the higher part. I.E to read a 512x512 buffer use 0, 0, 512, 512

Parameters:
fb the framebuffer to read from
minX the left limit of the region
minY the lower limit of the region
maxX the right limit of the region
maxY the upper limit of the region
channels what channels to read out from the buffer
target the buffer to write the result to. Must be (maxY - minY) * (maxX - minX) * channelCount floats big
Returns:
The result of the operation.
Examples:
examples-physical/code/common/textures.h, examples/code/common/textures.h, examples/code/pointcloud/pointcloud.cpp, include/beastapi/beastframebuffer.h, and maya/beastmayaplugin/src/beastwrappers/beastframebufferwrapper.cpp.
ILBStatus ILBReadRegionLDR ( ILBFramebufferHandle  fb,
int32  minX,
int32  minY,
int32  maxX,
int32  maxY,
ILBChannelSelection  channels,
float  gamma,
unsigned char *  target 
)
Search for all occurrences

Reads back a region in a framebuffer.

The region is specified as inclusive for the lower part and exclusive for the higher part. I.E to read a 512x512 buffer use 0, 0, 512, 512

Parameters:
fb the framebuffer to read from
minX the left limit of the region
minY the lower limit of the region
maxX the right limit of the region
maxY the upper limit of the region
channels what channels to read out from the buffer
gamma the gamma space to encode the image data in
target the buffer to write the result to. Must be (maxY - minY) * (maxX - minX) * channelCount bytes big
Returns:
The result of the operation.
Examples:
examples-physical/code/common/imageviewerbase.cpp, examples-physical/code/common/textures.h, examples/code/common/textures.h, include/beastapi/beastframebuffer.h, and maya/beastmayaplugin/src/beastwrappers/beastframebufferwrapper.cpp.
